task.summary: Default task
Refactor to split out classes into separate files
Player motion now determined by surface contact
Added targeting reticule
Shoot surface to place a portal on it
Store level layout in a json file
Functional Portals (Including prevention of two hole problem), air resistance, some global variables
Extra menu options, save game stuff
Added non-portal surfaces
Cleaner missile detection
For each surface instance, calculate the possible faces that could have portals. Removes issue where portals could spawn in the middle of walls
Fixed bug where changing the portal on the same surface did not clear the original portal
Removal of debug print lines
Prevent multiple end messages being produced; fixed bug where portals on top of a surface prevented jumping
Implemented sentry object - includes LOS for seeing player, laser to shoot at other sprites and updated level loader to incorporate sentry locations
Ensure hazards can be placed side by side
Smoother menu navigation and name entry
Implement explosion object to animate player or sentry deaths
Add switch objects and add option to deactivate exit unless switch is pressed
Companion cubes, dispenser to create them and buttons to activate dispenser
Level update
Return to level menu after player death; limit number of companion cubes
Fullscreen mode; cubes can be picked up

MESSAGE.value: Refactor to split out classes into separate files
Player motion now determined by surface contact
Added targeting reticule
Shoot surface to place a portal on it
Store level layout in a json file
Functional Portals (Including prevention of two hole problem), air resistance, some global variables
Extra menu options, save game stuff
Added non-portal surfaces

For each surface instance, calculate the possible faces that could have portals. Removes issue where portals could spawn in the middle of walls
Fixed bug where changing the portal on the same surface did not clear the original portal
Removal of debug print lines
Prevent multiple end messages being produced; fixed bug where portals on top of a surface prevented jumping
Implemented sentry object - includes LOS for seeing player, laser to shoot at other sprites and updated level loader to incorporate sentry locations
Ensure hazards can be placed side by side
Smoother menu navigation and name entry
Implement explosion object to animate player or sentry deaths
Add switch objects and add option to deactivate exit unless switch is pressed
Companion cubes, dispenser to create them and buttons to activate dispenser
Level update
Return to level menu after player death; limit number of companion cubes
Fullscreen mode; cubes can be picked up

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value: Fullscreen mode; cubes can be picked up
